TextLibrary.Text: You have been defeated by the Firewalker, but Tauron allows you to try again.
You see a huge pike. Impaled upon it are the heads of many creatures: Humans, Elves and Dwarves to name but a few...
Tauron Flamebite is waiting for you on the steps of the Horned Temple.
You must enter the Horned Temple.
You must travel north to see the Pike.
You must try to enter the Horned Temple once again.
You must defeat a Minotaur Firewalker at the Horned Temple to prove your worth to Tauron Flamebite.
Tauron seems to have warmed to you - just a little.
Firewalkers are similar to regular Minotaurs, but they have a stock of fire-related spells.
